title: Politician

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Your current party is decided by the faction of the person that visited you last. (If multiple people visited, you pick one faction of your visitors to become your party at the end of the night.)
- At the end of each night, you will be told of your current party. You start aligned with the Neutral party.
- You don't know the members of your party's faction.
- You can only ever gain 1 Credibility from being partied with Town. Afterwards, you can no longer gain Credibility from being partied with town.
- If you vote for a player opposed to your party, you gain 1 Credibility at the end of the day. If you vote for a player who is a member of your party, you lose all Credibility at the end of the day.
- You cannot be killed by Evils - they instead are told you're a Politician 4233.

fields.name: Notifications:
fields.value:
"Your current party is: [x-Faction]"
"You betrayed your party! You lost all your Credibility."
"You followed your party! You gained 1 Credibility."

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Have each living Peasant fulfill their Destiny.
